summary: Delving into our collective nightmares, this horror-documentary investigates the origins of our most terrifying urban legends and the true stories that may have inspired them.
cast: Rachel Mills|Joshua Zeman|Stephen Winick|James Presley|Casey Roberts|Bill Ellis|Robby Robertson|Mark Bledsoe|Jereme Kennington|Ed Goad|Craig Smyser|Mike Hinton|David Crump|Carol Haley Holt|Mary Beth Brown|Joan Sorrels|Peter Brendt|Joe Durwin|Isaiah Thompson|Bob Egan|Jason Moran|Ken Melvoin-Berg|Tony Beckley|Charles Bessett|William Boyett|Cindy Butler|Connie Chung|Tony Dakota|Phil Donahue|Rick Hartley|Kasi Lemmons|Joyce Nelson|Ronald Clark O'Bryan|Oliver Robins|Ashley Stanfill|Susan Starnes|Youell Swinney|Gregory Palmer
title: Killer Legends
